YOUTUBE2_AUTH_STATUS_CODE_READY: To sign in, go to Verification URL and enter the Code below.
YOUTUBE2_AUTH_STATUS_SIGNED_IN_AS: You are currently signed in as {}.
YOUTUBE2_AUTOPLAY_FETCH: Autoplay: fetching more items for playback...
YOUTUBE2_AUTOPLAY_ADDED: Autoplay: added {} items to the queue
YOUTUBE2_MSG_AUTOPLAY_ADD_TO_HISTORY: You have enabled Autoplay but disabled Add to History. This can lead to a high number of repeating autoplay videos. Would you like to enable Add to History now?
YOUTUBE2_DOC_LOAD_FULL_PLAYLISTS: If enabled, items of a playlist will be fetched in batches until all have been retrieved. Note that requests are rate limited, so you may experience extended loading times for long playlists. Also, this feature doesn't (yet) work with playlists shown on the plugin's landing page.
YOUTUBE2_DOC_AUTOPLAY: When a YouTube track has finished playing and there are no further items in the queue, Autoplay will automatically fetch more items based on the last one played and add them to the queue for playback. Only works when Repeat and Random playback modes are Off.
YOUTUBE2_DOC_AUTOPLAY_CLEAR_QUEUE: Clear the queue first before adding more items.
YOUTUBE2_DOC_AUTOPLAY_PREF_MIX_RELATED: If enabled, Autoplay will source videos from Mixes or Related Videos in preference to using YouTube's default.
YOUTUBE2_DOC_ADD_TO_HISTORY: Add items to YouTube watch history as they are played.
YOUTUBE2_DOC_LIVE_STREAM_QUALITY: If you experience choppy playback of live streams, try setting this to a lower value. Note that while live streams with lower quality settings do have lower video resolutions, they do not necessarily have worse audio quality. You can therefore start with the lowest quality setting (144p) and move your way up to find the optimal balance between performance and quality.
YOUTUBE2_DOC_YT_PLAYBACK_MODE: Under YouTube Playback Mode, clicking a video will queue and play only that video, regardless of the Playback Mode selected in Volumio Playback Options.
YOUTUBE2_ERR_REQUIRE_SIGN_IN: You need to be signed in to access this content. You can do this in the plugin settings.
